edu.umaryland.igs.idea
Class SiteSubstitutionModel

java.lang.Object
  edu.umaryland.igs.idea.SiteSubstitutionModel

public class SiteSubstitutionModel
extends Object

The SiteSubstitutionModel class represents one of codeml's site models. The class's primary purpose is to provide methods for converting between representations of the models.

Written:

Copyright (C) 2007, Amy Egan and Joana C. Silva.

All rights reserved.

Author:
Amy Egan

Field Detail

SHORT_MODEL_NAMES

static final String[] SHORT_MODEL_NAMES

modelNumber

private int modelNumber
Constructor Detail

SiteSubstitutionModel

public SiteSubstitutionModel(int modelNumber)
This constructs an object representing the site model with the different number. It throws an IllegalArgumentException if the supplied number is invalid.

Parameters:
modelNumber - the number of the model to create

SiteSubstitutionModel

public SiteSubstitutionModel(String modelNameOrAbbreviation)
This constructor creates a SiteSubstitutionModel from any of various string representations of a model: a. the number itself as a string (e.g., "0") b. the model abbreviation (e.g., "M0") c. the short model name (e.g., "one-ratio") d. the full model name (e.g., "0-one-ratio")

Parameters:
modelNameOrAbbreviation - a String in any of the formats listed above
Method Detail

setModelNumber

private void setModelNumber(int modelNumber)
This sets the modelNumber field to the specified number or throws an IllegalArgumentException if the supplied number is invalid.

Parameters:
modelNumber - the model number to attempt to set for this SiteSubstitutionModel

modelNumber

public int modelNumber()
The modelNumber method returns the number for this model.

Returns:
the number for this model

modelNumberString

public String modelNumberString()
The modelNumberString method returns the number for this model as a String.

Returns:
the number for this model as a String

formattedLikelihoodIdentifier

public String formattedLikelihoodIdentifier()
For a given model number i, the formattedLikelihoodIdentifier method returns an HTML string which will appear in an HTML document as l_i (with l a cursive lowercase L and the underscore denoting a subscript).

Returns:
an HTML string which will be displayed as "cursive little-L sub-i"

modelAbbreviation

public String modelAbbreviation()
The modelAbbreviation method returns a String consisting of the model number prepended by "M".

Returns:
"Mi" for a given model number i

shortModelName

public String shortModelName()
The shortModelName method returns the unnumbered model name associated with the given model number.

Returns:
the unnumbered model name for this number

fullModelName

public String fullModelName()
The fullModelName method returns a String of the form "Mi-shortname".

Returns:
"Mi-shortname" for a given model number i with the unnumbered name "shortname"
